channel.title: Essay question
channel.description:
Why must a development company consider both Market Research and Production Research before starting a new product?
Lol, can you believe I'm doing a course for games Dev? More like business studies -_-

item.title: Essay question
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Market research because they need to actually find out if there even is demand for their product, and production research to find out what the costs of the production will be, which then again they rely upon the market research they did earlier. You’re not gonna start a company selling stuff for cheaper than what you’re spending on buying it… That’s what I think, at least.

Read full topic
